prompts: Create a volcano-themed Pokemon that can control lava and has a fiery personality.
Imagine a creature with a magma-like body that can withstand extreme heat.
Generate a Pokemon resembling a mountain with fiery features and a powerful stance.
Show me an orange, fire-type Pokemon that has a flowing lava cape.
Design a creature that embodies both fire and earth elements, with a robust build.
Make an image of a Pokemon that thrives in volcanic areas and has a unique appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that looks majestic with molten features and can erupt in flames.
